attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make credit reports less strict as 1 missed payment even if it's the lenders fault goes on your credit report and takes too long to remove and  the next lender only can see you are a bad payer,This might affect your life very much(suicide in one case) And this must cost the economy money to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
